channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Up to 65% Off Walmart Promo Codes - October 2024
item.description: Get up to 65% off flash deals for 1000s of products with hand-picked deals for electronics, groceries, clothing, and more.

item.title: We’re Tracking the Best October Prime Day 2024 Deals Live
item.description: Amazon's massive sale ends today and the WIRED Reviews team is working in shifts to bring you the best deals on products we've tested and tracked.
